title: SKBitmap.Decode( NONE_EXISTING_FILE_PATH ) should return null
body:
### Description

Having trouble catching a useful exception, and will have to write some guard code around it.
MSDN docs suggest that SKBitmap should return null if an error occurs

### Code

SKBitmap.Decode( NONE_EXISTING_FILE_PATH );

### Expected Behavior

either throw file not found or return null

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

### Actual Behavior

Caused a native crash and so far I have been unable to catch any exception.
From some quick digging, SkiaSharp creates a stream from the path, this stream is already at the end...

<!-- a general description of what really happened -->
